item.title: Spot Gold Plunges Over 1.00% Intraday, Now Trading at $3334.20 per Ounce
item.description: On July 25th, spot gold dropped by more than 1.00% during the trading day. It is now trading at $3334.20 per ounce. (Oriental Wealth)

item.title: USDC Treasury Burns Approximately 54.467 Million USDC on the Ethereum Blockchain
item.description: On July 25th, as monitored by Whale Alert, approximately 54.467 million USDC was burned in the USDC Treasury on the Ethereum blockchain.

item.title: U.S. publicly traded company Volcon increased its BTC holdings by 2903 coins, bringing its total holdings to 3183.37 coins.
item.description: On July 25th, as per NLNico's monitoring, the US-listed company Volcon (VLCN) added 2,903 BTC to its holdings today. It now holds a total of 3,183.37 BTC. The total purchase price is approximately 375 million US dollars, with an average purchase price of 117,697 US dollars.According to market data, Volcon (VLCN) surged by more than 16% intraday. Currently, it is up by 2.43%, with a stock price of 13.9 US dollars and a trading volume of 10.53 million US dollars.

item.title: Trump Says 50% Chance of U.S.-EU Deal, To Impose New Round of Tariffs on Other Countries
item.description: July 25th. Although EU diplomats have shown some optimism recently regarding an impending trade agreement, Trump stated that the likelihood of the US and the EU reaching a deal to lower import tariffs is "only 50-50." Trump said, "I believe the chances of reaching an agreement are 50-50. It may even be less than that, but there is still a 50% chance. US and EU negotiators are working closely together to reach an agreement." Earlier this month, Trump issued a letter stating that if the US and the EU fail to reach an agreement by August 1st, the EU will face punitive measures in the form of a 30% tariff on most goods, as well as additional tariffs specific to certain industries. Trump also mentioned today that in the coming days, he will unilaterally send out nearly 200 tariff letters to impose a new round of tariffs on other countries. Some of these letters specify tariff rates of 10% or 15%. (Jinse Finance)

item.title: Trump Unleashes 'Boiling the Frog' Pressure to Cut Interest Rates, Powell Privately Vows to Serve Full Term
item.description: On July 25th, according to a report by CNN, Gary Gensler, the Chairman of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), has informed many colleagues and allies that he will never give in to President Trump's calls for his resignation. He has pledged to withstand the unprecedented and multi-faceted attacks from Trump in the coming months due to his refusal to cut interest rates. Gensler stated privately that his decision to remain in his position is not only for personal reasons but also because his chairmanship is closely related to the overall independence of the SEC. Resigning now would weaken the SEC's long-standing independence from political interference. Gensler strongly believes that his responsibility is to uphold this independence.Gensler previously served briefly in the George W. Bush administration and is known for his meticulous and non-partisan "straight shooter" image during his more than ten years at the SEC. This helped him earn Trump's nomination as SEC Chairman

item.title: DEGEN mini Application Update Completed, Fully Compatible with The Base App and Farcaster
item.description: On July 25th, based on official Degen news, the DEGEN mini application has been updated and is now fully compatible with The Base App and Farcaster. About two weeks before the launch of the DEGEN lottery, all tipping fees were waived.

item.title: Maple Finance has proposed MIP-018, aiming to use 25% of protocol fee revenue to buy back SYRUP.
item.description: On July 25th, Maple Finance (SYRUP) launched the MIP-018 proposal. It was proposed to raise the allocation of protocol fee revenue used for the SYRUP token buyback from 20% to 25% starting from the third quarter of 2025 and distribute it as rewards to SYRUP stakers. This proposal is only eligible for voting by stSYRUP holders.

item.title: US Stock Market Open Cryptocurrency Stocks Mixed, SharpLink Up 4.55%
item.description: On July 25th, based on market data, the U.S. stock market opened with the Dow increasing by 0.14%, the S&P 500 rising by 0.14%, and the Nasdaq going up by 0.02%. Cryptocurrency stocks demonstrated mixed performance, as follows:The "ETH Version of MicroStrategy", SharpLink Gaming (SBET), rose by 4.55%, announcing today that a former BlackRock digital asset strategy executive has joined as co-CEO;Mercurity Fintech Holding (MFH) plunged by 13% after previously announcing the launch of a Solana-based treasury strategy;Volcon (VLCN) rose by 6.2% after raising over $500 million to launch a Bitcoin financial strategy;Circle (CRCL) fell by 0.6%;Coinbase (COIN) dropped by 1.02%;Tesla (TSLA.O) decreased by 1.1%;MicroStrategy (MSTR) rose by 2.27%;MARA Holdings (MARA) fell by 2.5%;MicroStrategy (MSTR) fell by 2%.

item.title: Trump Speaks Again, Saying "Believes Powell Will Lower Interest Rates"
item.description: On July 25th, U.S. President Trump: Anticipates that Powell will lower interest rates. (Kryptonite)

item.title: BNB Chain Announces 15 Early-Stage Projects for the Tenth Season of its MVB Accelerator Program
item.description: On July 25th, BNB Chain made an announcement regarding the 15 early-stage projects selected for the tenth season of the Most Valuable Builder (MVB) Accelerator Program. These projects include: the AI Minting Factory RICE AI, the Decentralized Identity Data Intelligence Layer Whitebridge Network, the DeSoc Protocol AGNT.Hub, the Web3 Application Abstraction Layer FlashX.ai, the Trading Terminal Opsin, the DeFi Protocol Sigma Money, the Smart Ring Bitring, the Web3 Consumer and Financial Layer ShareX, the Decentralized Human Layer dLife, the Cryptocurrency Payment Framework AEON, the Multi-chain Payment Infrastructure Pepay Labs, the RWA Launchpad Asseto, the Programmable Protocol AXC (RWA), the Stablecoin Infrastructure DMZ Finance, and the Stablecoin-Pegged DeFi ETF R2.
